item.title: Well help me please :)
item.dc:creator: @Blake11roys Blake11roys
item.description:
@Blake11roys wrote:

this is for testscape source

ok i think this is how u do it

go to client.java and search this

else if (FightType == 5 || FightType == 6 || FightType == 7)

below that u should see this

{ TotalExp = (double)(330 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerRanged); }

now just change where it says

TotalExp = (double)(330 * hitDiff);

change the 330 but i think its 400 on urs

Read full topic
